Articles.Content: I'd like to see mod that gives me a big red button. Push it, and there's a big asteroid on a collision course for Kerbin and you have to save the world. Something bad happens if you don't.
You can use hyperedit to move an asteroid I think

You can use hyperedit to move an asteroid I think

I could move Jool into a collision course with Kerbin if I wanted to with hyperedit.

I could move Jool into a collision course with Kerbin if I wanted to with hyperedit.

Planet+Planet=Nothing(maybe destroyed ships?)
